  {
    "text": "if I had to grow a faceless YouTube channel from zero

here's what Iâ€™d do:

- find a small channel going viral 
- train claude on their top 5 scripts
- generate 30-60 min scripts for proven topics
- create voiceovers with elevenlabs
- grab free stock footage from pixabay
- edit in capcut (takes 30 mins max)
- post 4-6 times per week consistently
- copy what works, iterate what doesn't",

  {

  {
    "text": "How much can you earn from a faceless YouTube channel? 

A lot more than people think. Many top nichesâ€”like education, motivation, tech, and storytellingâ€”donâ€™t require you to show your face at all. 

Average earnings based on views: 

â€¢ 1,000 views â†’ ~$5 
â€¢ 10,000 views â†’ ~$50 
â€¢ 100,000 views â†’ ~$500 
â€¢ 1,000,000 views â†’ ~$5,000 
â€¢ 10,000,000 views â†’ ~$50,000 
 
You can start a faceless channel in minutes using AI voiceovers, stock footage, and simple editing. No camera, no studioâ€”just create, upload, and grow. 

If you want to earn online without being on camera this is way to create video.

  {
    "text": "Officially confirmed: faceless YouTube money is REAL - 1st paycheck just landed in my bank ğŸ¥¹

It led me to pay $5k for a coaching program that honestly wasnt that good, but IT FORCED ME to take action, because there was no way I had spent $5k without making it back

All of this has happened in the last 3 months which is completely crazy. I feel very lucky to get to this point. The only reason I think I made it here was constantly doing affirmations and visualization
